scripts.test: tsc src/services/*.ts src/models/clip.ts --module commonjs --moduleResolution node --target ES2020 --esModuleInterop --outDir .tmp && echo '{"type":"commonjs"}' > .tmp/package.json && mv .tmp/services/services.test.js .tmp/services/services.test.cjs && node --test .tmp/services/services.test.cjs
